title: Alpharma, Pfizer Launch Generic Neurontin (Reuters)
description: Reuters - Alpharma Inc.  on Friday began\selling a cheaper generic version of Pfizer Inc.'s   #36;3\billion a year epilepsy drug Neurontin without waiting for a\court ruling on Pfizer's request to block the copycat medicine.

title: Mbeki to go-ahead with Ivory Coast visit
description: President Thabo Mbeki is to visit the Ivory Coast today, the presidency and <1> department of foreign affairs said in a joint statement.

title: Sudanese cabinet welcomes UN resolution on Sudan

title: A New Crew Arrives At the Space Station
description: A Soyuz spacecraft with a replacement crew for the International Space Station docked safely with the orbiting <4> complex early today.

title: Possible Source of Cosmic Rays Found
description: com Staff. Astronomers have produced the first truly useful image ever of something in space using gamma rays. It #39;s a picture only an astronomer could love, but it appears to help solve a century-long mystery.

title: Bucknell Upsets No. 10 Pittsburgh 69-66 (AP)
description: AP - Kevin Bettencourt made two free throws with 23 seconds remaining to give Bucknell the lead in a 69-66 victory over No. 10 Pittsburgh on Sunday night, one of the biggest wins in school history.

title: Two-goal Kalou kills Rangers hopes
description: GLASGOW, Scotland -- Scottish giants Rangers crashed out of a European competition for the second time this season following a 2-0 defeat at home to Auxerre in the UEFA Cup.

title: Football: England fury over abuse
description: England's Jermaine Jenas demands action after racist abuse by Spain fans.

title: Patriots Sign Top Pick Watson (Reuters)
description: Reuters - The New England Patriots\Monday announced the signing of first-round draft pick Benjamin\Watson. As per team <2> policy, terms of the tight end's deal were\not released.

title: Ready for Service Pack 2? Not so fast, XP Pro users
description: You #39;ve been patient. You #39;ve done what Microsoft asked you to do. You #39;re ready to download Service Pack 2 for Windows XP.

title: Russia Sends Troops to Guard Nuclear Sites (Reuters)
description: Reuters - Russia deployed extra troops to guard\dozens of nuclear facilities across the country on Wednesday\after militants seized a school in the south and a suicide bomb\attack in Moscow, the nuclear authority said.

title: Stocks Seen Flat Are Oil Edges Higher
description: NEW YORK (Reuters) - U.S. stock futures got a slight boost  on Friday after a report showed U.S. retail sales rose in  October, but the market still looked to open flat, pulling back  from the previous day's rally as oil prices nudge higher.

title: New structure found deep within West Antarctic Ice Sheet
description: Scientists have found a remarkable new structure deep within the West Antarctic Ice Sheet which suggests that the whole ice sheet is more susceptible to future change than previously <4> thought.
